title: Parsing URLs in Go | Challenge
description: The purpose of this challenge is to demonstrate how to parse URLs in Go.

meta.title: Go | URL Parsing Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to parse URLs in Go programming language, including extracting scheme, authentication info, host, port, path, query params, and query fragment.
